uri.description: The URI of the configuration entity

vlan_id.description: The unique ID of the VLAN where the subnet is assigned.

ip_address_mode.description: The subnet's IP mode. Mode IAAM_DISABLED is not supported.

ip_address.description: The subnet's IP address. Mandatory if ip_address_mode is IAAM_STATIC.

ip_mask.description: The IP address mask. Mandatory if ip_address_mode is IAAM_STATIC.
